content.heading: HTML File Paths
paragraphs: A file path describes the location of a file in a website's folder structure.

rows: The 'picture.jpg' file is located in the same folder as the current page.
The 'picture.jpg' file is located in the images folder within the current folder.
The 'picture.jpg' file is located in the images folder at the root of the website.
The 'picture.jpg' file is located in the folder one level up from the current folder.
